title: Technical Council
desc: The Technical Council is involved in the conduction of various technical activities with the motto of Build, Polish and Grow a Diversified Technical Community.

title: Cultural Council
desc: The Cultural Council is involved in conduction of various culture related activities in the institute for the student body.

title: Sports Council
desc: The Sports Council is involved in conduction of sports related activities in the institute. Both indoor as well as outdoor sports are included in the same.

title: Academic Council
desc: The Academic council is involved in overseeing and taking care of the various academic aspects of the student body.

title: Hostel Council
desc: The Hostel Council primarily takes care of all the activities, issues and events that pertain to student hostels and social factors.

title: Mess Committee
desc: The Mess Committee oversees the mess functions and takes care of the quality, interests and activities of the mess.
